text: The 2018–19 season was Al-Fayha's 65th year in existence and second season in the Pro League. This season Al-Fayha participated in the Pro League and King Cup. The season covers the period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- ! Date ! Pos. !
